name: 10 Numbers in Under 10 Seconds
description:
Here is one of the fives games that ill be making for the Game-a-Week Challenge. This week's theme, if you havn't already guessed it is 10 seconds or less...

In this game you have to get as close as possible to the target number in under 10 seconds. This is done by dragging two numbers into the open slots to add them together. Each succsesive answer is added or subtracted onto your total number depending on the outcome

Known Bugs

-At times the accuracy/difference scoring system shows off an inaccurate reading (how ironic).

- If the mouse goes outside of the window it can break the game, so try not to do that
